effect.scarlet-violet: Prevents heal bell from curing the Pokémon, whether or not it is in battle.
effect.the-teal-mask: Prevents heal bell from curing the Pokémon, whether or not it is in battle.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Prevents heal bell from curing the Pokémon, whether or not it is in battle.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.
